Digital Media / Social Media Manager Job at DM Holdings




        
    

        
        DM Holdings (DMH) is a conglomerate of companies with vast interests in Entertainment and Media business. With each of the subsidiaries’ enviable track record, DMH is poised to take a strategic position in providing cutting edge services within the Media/Marketing Communication landscape.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Media / Social Media Manager
Job Location: Ojodu Berger, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Plan, create, and manage exciting digital media projects.
	Set up and run social media accounts with daily engagement.
	Influence customer behavior through strategic content & conversations.
	Craft compelling posts, online ads, newsletters, and seasonal content.
	Monitor trends, competitors, and online chatter for valuable insights.
	Track campaign performance and share progress with internal teams.
	Design graphics, edit videos, and collaborate on media content that drives results.
	Keep web content fresh and aligned with brand goals.


Requirements


	A Degree in Journalism, PR, or Marketing Communications.
	Minimum of 5 years of experience in a similar role.
	Proficiency in Graphic Design, Adobe Photoshop, video editing & social media marketing.
	Creative mindset, attention to detail, and passion for digital trends.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: abiolak@dmholdingslimited.com using "Digital Media Executive" as the subject of the email.

Senior Sales Account Manager Job at TeamAce Limited




        
    

        
        TeamAce Limited - Our client is a globally recognized telecommunications and information technology solutions provider. As a high-tech enterprise affiliated with a leading state authority in China, they have established themselves as a major force in the optical communications industry. With a strong international presence and operations in over 90 countries, the company is ranked among the top global players in optical transport, broadband access, and optical cable systems.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Senior Sales Account Manager

Job Location: Lagos (Occasional travel within Nigeria required)
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

            
    




	Identify target customers and develop network plans with specific objectives across various channels and market segments.
	Lead the execution of access network projects from initiation to completion, ensuring internal alignment and fostering cross-functional collaboration.
	Analyze customer insights, market trends, and industry best practices to design and implement effective marketing strategies.
	Create, maintain, and analyze performance reports across multiple platforms; extract key insights to shape go-to-market strategies and develop formal proposals and recommendations.
	Take ownership of providing solutions for Telecommunication Bids, with necessary support from headquarters.


Requirements


	A Bachelor’s Degree or higher in a telecommunication-related field with 3-5 years of experience.
	Applicants must not be more than 35 years old.
	Proficiency in English (spoken and written); knowledge of Chinese is a strong advantage.
	Solid understanding of GPON, FTTH, and ODN technologies.
	Prior experience working with Huawei, ZTT, ZTE, Heng Tong, or YOFC, Airtel, or MTN is required.
	Excellent communication, teamwork, organizational, and coordination skills.
	Must be based in Lagos and open to traveling across Nigeria as needed.


Remuneration
N1,000,000 - N2,000,000 / Month (no salary budget limit; negotiable based on experience).

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Call Centre Agent",
  "description": "Deskmayte is a virtual support team based in Lugbe Abuja, dedicated to empowering patient care and enhancing healthcare services. They offer virtual assistance services tailored for healthcare providers, focusing on efficiency, professionalism, and compassionate assistance. Their experienced virtual assistant agents are trained in healthcare and HIPAA laws to provide compassionate patient booking, efficient appointment management, personalized patient outreach, and HIPAA-compliant support.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Call Centre Agent

Job Location:&nbsp;Lugbe, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time (On-site)

About the Role


	We&rsquo;re on the hunt for a charismatic communicator who knows how to win people over with just their voice (and maybe a little charm). As our Call Centre Agent ,you&rsquo;ll be the frontline closer&mdash;handling inbound/outbound calls, following up on leads, and turning interest into action.
	This isn&rsquo;t your average customer support gig&mdash;we need someone who can talk the talk and close the deal.


Responsibilities
What You&#39;ll Be Doing:


	Make and receive calls with confidence, clarity, and professionalism
	Engage prospects, build rapport quickly, and pitch services/products effectively
	Follow up on warm leads and turn them into paying customers
	Keep records of interactions, track conversions, and update CRM tools
	Handle inquiries via phone, email, or chat in a friendly, persuasive tone
	Assist in marketing tasks like email outreach, follow-ups, and appointment scheduling


Requirements
What We&#39;re Looking For:


	Interested candidates should possess an HND with 1-3 years of experience.
	Fluent, articulate English speaker with a warm, confident voice
	Strong background in sales, marketing, or telemarketing
	Proven ability to close deals&mdash;you know how to turn a &ldquo;maybe&rdquo; into a &ldquo;yes!&rdquo;
	Comfortable working with sales scripts, objection handling, and CRM tools
	Organized, reliable, and self-motivated
	Ability to adapt your tone and pitch depending on the client.


Salary
N185,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;hr@deskmayte.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Application Question(s)


	Are you available to start immediately?
	Where in Abuja do you live? (If you do not answer this question, your application will not be considered)
	Have you completed your NYSC?
	Are you available to work night shifts?


Note:&nbsp;This is an Onsite role. Only candidates living around Lugbe, Airport Road and Galadimawa environs in Abuja will be considered.",

Call Centre Agent Job at Deskmayte




        
    

        
        Deskmayte is a virtual support team based in Lugbe Abuja, dedicated to empowering patient care and enhancing healthcare services. They offer virtual assistance services tailored for healthcare providers, focusing on efficiency, professionalism, and compassionate assistance. Their experienced virtual assistant agents are trained in healthcare and HIPAA laws to provide compassionate patient booking, efficient appointment management, personalized patient outreach, and HIPAA-compliant support.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Call Centre Agent

Job Location: Lugbe, Abuja (FCT)
Employment Type: Full-time (On-site)

About the Role
     

            
    




	We’re on the hunt for a charismatic communicator who knows how to win people over with just their voice (and maybe a little charm). As our Call Centre Agent ,you’ll be the frontline closer—handling inbound/outbound calls, following up on leads, and turning interest into action.
	This isn’t your average customer support gig—we need someone who can talk the talk and close the deal.


Responsibilities
What You'll Be Doing:


	Make and receive calls with confidence, clarity, and professionalism
	Engage prospects, build rapport quickly, and pitch services/products effectively
	Follow up on warm leads and turn them into paying customers
	Keep records of interactions, track conversions, and update CRM tools
	Handle inquiries via phone, email, or chat in a friendly, persuasive tone
	Assist in marketing tasks like email outreach, follow-ups, and appointment scheduling


Requirements
What We're Looking For:


	Interested candidates should possess an HND with 1-3 years of experience.
	Fluent, articulate English speaker with a warm, confident voice
	Strong background in sales, marketing, or telemarketing
	Proven ability to close deals—you know how to turn a “maybe” into a “yes!”
	Comfortable working with sales scripts, objection handling, and CRM tools
	Organized, reliable, and self-motivated
	Ability to adapt your tone and pitch depending on the client.


Salary
N185,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: hr@deskmayte.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Application Question(s)


	Are you available to start immediately?
	Where in Abuja do you live? (If you do not answer this question, your application will not be considered)
	Have you completed your NYSC?
	Are you available to work night shifts?


Note: This is an Onsite role. Only candidates living around Lugbe, Airport Road and Galadimawa environs in Abuja will be considered.
